package.name: Net_IMAP
package.summary: Provides an implementation of the IMAP protocol
package.description: Provides an implementation of the IMAP4Rev1 protocol using PEAR's Net_Socket and Auth_SASL class.

release.notes: - login method can authenticate with the following methods: DIGEST-MD4, CRAM-MD5, LOGIN and the login command - Fixed require_once bug - A lot of new mailbox-related functions - 2 Examples of use - fixes in protocol parser

- Ups I call require_once ./IMAPProtocol.php instead of require_once Net/IMAPProtocol.php sorry - login method can authenticate with the following methods: DIGEST-MD4, CRAM-MD5, LOGIN and the login command - A lot of new mailbox-related functions - 2 Examples of use to the test directory - fixes in protocol parser
- The IMAP Procotol generic parser is now implemented.
